FuncDef:
The remote-fec ldp command configures an IP address and mask for a remote LDP FEC in a LSP trace test instance.
The undo remote-fec ldp command restores the default configuration.
By default, no IP address or mask is configured for a remote LDP FEC.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a remote LDP FEC.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a mask for the IP address of a remote LDP FEC.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an SR-MPLS BE and LDP interworking scenario, SR-MPLS BE and LDP services are configured on the local and remote devices, respectively. If the remote device does not support interworking with the SR-MPLS BE service, the local device initiates LDP diagnosis to the remote device. You must run the remote-fec ldp command on the local device to configure an IP address and mask for a remote LDP FEC to ensure normal interworking.
